rmangal 0.6.0

    • Vignette Title

Retrieve mangal network including the nodes and the edges

Source: R/get_network_by_id.R
get_network_by_id.Rd

Retrieve mangal network including the nodes and the edges

get_network_by_id(id, ...)

Arguments

id

numeric mangal ID network
...

arguments from rmangal::get_singletons()

Value

object mgNetwork:

  • network: list of all generic informations on the network

  • nodes: data.frame of all nodes with taxonomic informations

  • edges: data.frame of all edges (ecological interactions), with the attribute used to describe the interaction

  • dataset: list of all informations on the dataset associated to the network

  • reference: list of all informations on the original publication

Examples

get_network_by_id(id = 18)
#> $network
#> $network$id
#> [1] 18
#> 
#> $network$name
#> [1] "mosquin_martin_1967_19650731_18"
#> 
#> $network$date
#> [1] "1965-07-31T04:00:00.000Z"
#> 
#> $network$geom
#> $network$geom$type
#> [1] "Point"
#> 
#> $network$geom$coordinates
#> $network$geom$coordinates[[1]]
#> [1] -114.9667
#> 
#> $network$geom$coordinates[[2]]
#> [1] 75
#> 
#> 
#> 
#> $network$description
#> [1] "Occurence of flower-visiting insect on plant species, two miles north of Bailey Point, Melville Island, N.W.T., Canada"
#> 
#> $network$public
#> [1] TRUE
#> 
#> $network$all_interactions
#> [1] FALSE
#> 
#> $network$created_at
#> [1] "2019-02-22T18:38:37.491Z"
#> 
#> $network$updated_at
#> [1] "2019-02-22T18:38:37.491Z"
#> 
#> $network$dataset_id
#> [1] 4
#> 
#> $network$user_id
#> [1] 3
#>
